code: import React from'react';import'./Certifications.css';import{FaCertificate,FaCalendar}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Certifications=()=>{const certifications=[{title:'Programming for Everybody',issuer:'University of Michigan',date:'Jan \'25',link:'#'},{title:'Modern Web Development with Laravel & PHP',issuer:'Board Infinity',date:'May \'25',link:'#'},{title:'Backend Development: Node.js, Express, MongoDB & REST APIs',issuer:'Board Infinity',date:'Oct \'25',link:'#'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"certifications",className:"certifications section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Certifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"certifications-grid",children:certifications.map((cert,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"certification-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"certification-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCertificate,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"certification-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"certification-title",children:cert.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"certification-issuer",children:cert.issuer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"certification-date",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCalendar,{})," ",cert.date]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:cert.link,className:"certification-link",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"View Certificate \u2192"})]},index))})]})});};export default Certifications;
